nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(SysLocation) AS 'Location', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Health Reason' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wireless-controller'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Current CPU Utilization (%)' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wireless-controller'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Current Memory Utilization (%)' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wireless-controller'
FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Min CPU', max(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Max CPU', average(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Average CPU' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wireless-controller' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Min Memory', max(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Max Memory', average(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Average Memory' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wireless-controller' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(if_OperStatus) AS 'Operational Status', latest(if_Speed) AS 'Interface Speed', latest(kentik.snmp.IfInUtilization) AS 'RX %', latest(kentik.snmp.IfOutUtilization) AS 'TX %', latest(kentik.snmp.ifInErrorPercent) AS 'RX Error %', latest(kentik.snmp.ifOutErrorPercent) AS 'TX Error %' FACET if_interface_name AS 'Interface', if_Description AS 'Description' WHERE provider = 'kentik-wireless-controller' LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsNumRegisteredAP) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsNumRegisteredAP, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsNumAP) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsNumAP, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalRxPkts) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalRxPkts, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalRxBytes) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalRxBytes, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalTxPkts) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalTxPkts, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalTxBytes) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalTxBytes, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalTxFail) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalTxFail, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalTxRetry) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalTxRetry, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalAssocFail) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsWLANTotalAssocFail, latest(kentik.snmp.ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsAllNumSta) AS ruckusUnleashedSystemStatsAllNumSta WHERE provider = 'kentik-wireless-controller' LIMIT MAX
